WPoptic is a specialized tool designed to detect all active plugins and theme on any WordPress site.

With WPoptic, you can see exactly what WordPress theme and WordPress plugins are in use, covering everything from SEO and security to performance and eCommerce. This tool reveals a complete list of plugins across categories like analytics, marketing, forms, and caching, giving you insight into how WordPress sites are enhanced and customized.

Install WPoptic for Chrome to quickly uncover the plugins powering any WordPress site you visit.
